casebody.data:
BRAND INVESTMENT COMPANY (formerly known as A. W. KUTSCHE & COMPANY) v. THE UNITED STATES. [No. 44432. Decided June 5, 1944] Mr. Max Freedman for plaintiff. Mr. W. A. Stern, II, with whom was Mr. Assistant Attorney General Francis M. Shea, for defendant.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
